SELECT answer FROM question WHERE questionId = #{questionId}

SELECT a.openId ,a.rightNum,b.nickName,b.headImgUrl from (SELECT openId,count(status='1'OR NULL ) as rightNum FROM question_history WHERE create_time between #{0} and #{1} GROUP BY openId ORDER BY rightNum DESC LIMIT 10)a, (SELECT * FROM user_info)b WHERE a.openId=b.openId
SELECT count(id) AS todayNUM FROM question_history where openId = #{0} and created_time BETWEEN #{1} and #{2}
